channel.title: Please help it's about how to stop being able to log out while being frozen! etc
channel.description: Ok, I have tried to manage this tasks lots of times and I failed... So, I'm wondering cuz when im pking or soemthign and then i barrage someone and then they log out real fast to be unfrozen or theyll log out real fast to load theyre spec back up and theyll say it was a "lag" when my server never has lags... I want to know how to stop it! Please help!

item.title: Please help it's about how to stop being able to log out while being frozen! etc

item.description:
